name: abstract-triangles
description: - Draws random SVG triangles with [RaphaelJS](https://github.com/DmitryBaranovskiy/raphael/). - Adjust draw settings with [dat.GUI](https://github.com/dataarts/dat.gui). - Uses [Hammer.js](https://github.com/hammerjs/hammer.js) (1.1.3) to recognize a gesture. - Just for fun.
